reviewtext: The first card I bought was DOA. The second (for a Diamond Rio) works fine  everytime. Of note, the formatting for a Diamond Rio is different from that  for anything else, so even SanDisk's USB (etc) readers cannot decipher data  on a card that has been in a Rio. For that you must use the RioPort  software or erase and reformat the card in the device in which you would  like to use it.
